sentences.en: a smudge of lipstick on a cup
For added protection choose a lipstick with a sun screen.
sentences.cn: 选择防晒护唇膏来增强保护。

sentences.en: Helen's choice of lipstick was a good match for her skin-tone.
sentences.cn: 海伦选择的唇膏很适合她的肤色。

sentences.en: Her scarlet lipstick emphasized the whiteness of her teeth.
sentences.cn: 她鲜红色的口红更衬出了她牙齿的洁白。

sentences.en: I haven't even put any lipstick on.
She applied a little lipstick, wiped it off, but it left a pink tinge.
sentences.cn: 她抹了一点口红，又擦掉了，但却留下了一丝粉红色。

sentences.en: She kissed me, careful not to smudge me with her fresh lipstick.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地吻了我，以免把刚刚抹上的口红弄到我脸上。

sentences.en: She powdered her face and applied her lipstick and rouge.
sentences.cn: 她往脸上搽了粉，抹了口红和胭脂。

sentences.en: She was wearing bright red lipstick.
Taking out her lipstick, she began to paint her lips.
sentences.cn: 她拿出口红, 开始往嘴唇上抹.

sentences.en: You don't have to match your lipstick exactly to your outfit.
sentences.cn: 你不一定非要让唇膏的颜色同礼服完全搭配。

trans.tran_en: something used for adding colour to your lips, in the shape of a small stick
